statements: SELECT * FROM water_conservation_program;
SELECT participant_name, progress, achievements FROM water_conservation_program WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, progress FROM water_conservation_program WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_program ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, progress FROM water_conservation_program WHERE achievements LIKE '%success%';
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_program WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM water_conservation_program WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT participant_name, achievements FROM water_conservation_program WHERE participant_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_program WHERE achievements IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(achievements) > 100;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, achievements FROM water_conservation_program WHERE progress < 30 ORDER BY progress DESC, participant_name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, city FROM participants WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE participant_id = 5 ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE city = 'Paris' AND name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id <= 10;
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY city, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM achievements WHERE participant_id = 5 ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY participant_id HAVING total_achievements >= 3;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT participant_id, completed_steps FROM progress ORDER BY completed_steps DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE date_achieved > '2022-07-01' ORDER BY date_achieved;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, city ASC;
SELECT p.name, a.description FROM participants p JOIN achievements a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id WHERE a.date_achieved > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.date_achieved DESC;
SELECT p.name, pr.completed_steps FROM participants p JOIN progress pr ON p.participant_id = pr.participant_id WHERE pr.completed_steps >= 10 ORDER BY pr.completed_steps ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.email, pr.date FROM participants p JOIN progress pr ON p.participant_id = pr.participant_id WHERE pr.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY pr.date DESC;

SELECT p.name, a.description, pr.date FROM participants p JOIN achievements a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id JOIN progress pr ON p.participant_id = pr.participant_id WHERE a.date_achieved > pr.date ORDER BY pr.date ASC, a.date_achieved DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT id, name, email FROM participants WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT participant_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(activity_id) FROM progress GROUP BY participant_id HAVING COUNT(activity_id) > 5;
SELECT p.name, a.activity_name, pr.progress_status FROM participants p JOIN progress pr ON p.id = pr.participant_id JOIN activities a ON pr.activity_id = a.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE difficulty_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT participant_id, name, city FROM participants WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT name, age FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT program_name, description FROM programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT participant_id, email FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT activity_name, description, difficulty_level FROM activities ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC
